Structure# MTLIntersectionFunctionBufferArguments

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOS

```
struct MTLIntersectionFunctionBufferArguments
```

## [Overview](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctionbufferarguments#overview)

Struct containing arguments for intersection function buffers.

## [Topics](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctionbufferarguments#topics)

### [Intersection function tables](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctionbufferarguments#Intersection-function-tables)

[`protocol MTLIntersectionFunctionTable`](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctiontable)A table of intersection functions that Metal calls to perform ray-tracing intersection tests.[`class MTLIntersectionFunctionTableDescriptor`](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctiontabledescriptor)A specification of how to create an intersection function table.[`class MTLIntersectionFunctionDescriptor`](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctiondescriptor)A description of an intersection function that performs an intersection test.[`struct MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature`](/documentation/metal/mtlintersectionfunctionsignature)Constants for specifying different types of custom intersection functions.
